Manufacturability: Ensuring that the designed product can be manufactured efficiently and at scale, often in collaboration with production and manufacturing teams Quality Assurance: Implementing quality control measures to maintain product integrity and meet quality standards. column2: The product development role closely works with the leadership team including the top management and different heads at Pune and Mumbai. The role is responsible for supporting the vision and growth of the hygiene business by creating and developing new products and improving existing products role involves procurement, coordination, project management skill, being innovative, of a box thinker, and someone who is with strong business acumen. Create and enhance products that fill a niche in the market allowing the organisation to remain competitive in hygiene products. Determine product specifications according to a number of various factors and uses- identify opportunities in the market based on customer segments, needs, prices, trends of the products and market, Support manufacturing and design activities by developing prototypes for products in development. Develop the business case for new product and improve existing products Work closely with the sales team to collect data related to product market share, pricing, features, and ideas to develop viable products in the hygiene segment work with the sales team to test the market and market acceptability of the products (NPD) Submit proposals and designs for evaluation by the project team and management before moving to the next stage. Connect with existing and prospective customers and create marketing content (Features, benefits of the products) Excellent planning, organizational, and time management skills. Ability to grasp knowledge of Industry quickly. Works well within a team Can work independently Differentiate between important and urgent tasks Understands common goals and work in a team Supports the team by playing different roles and taking on several responsibilities so they can function as one unit working towards their common goal Gains cooperation and coordination across teams Adapts to different styles of communication when dealing with diverse audiences to optimize understanding Looks for ways to streamline work processes and reduce duplication of efforts Monitors adherence to performance standards and benchmarks Processes varied business information, sees patterns, trends and draws out key points Takes well-informed, effective, and timely decisions, even when data is limited
column11: Product Development, New Product Development, Designing, features, NPD, Tissue paper, Paper Product, Product Specification, Development, Hygiene Product

column2: About Us: Career Launcher Media is the institutional business arm of CL Educate Ltd (NSE: CLEDUCATE) that offers digital marketing & print solutions, events, and student outreach services to higher education institutions & universities across India. Role Brief:  Results-oriented professional with experience as a product manager in HEI space, including:  Product management or product-focused experience managing Product Lifecycle. Ability to break complex problems into smaller problems and leverage data to solve the same. Strong written and verbal communication skills with a precise articulations of customer problems. Proven experience as a Product Manager, specifically in product mapping and strategy development. Recommended Strong technical background, with knowledge of software development processes and methodologies. Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to translate market insights into actionable product decisions. Exceptional communication and presentation skills, project management skills. Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or related field II MBA preferred. Key Responsibilities Include: Developing and executing the product mapping strategy to drive growth and enhance the user experience.  Conduct market research to identify customer needs, market trends, and competitive landscape. Develop and maintain a product map that encompasses current and potential offerings, and aligns with business goals, customer demands, and market opportunities. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, to define and prioritize product requirements based on market insights. Monitor product performance and customer feedback to identify areas for improvement and optimize product mapping based on market needs. Collaborate with the marketing team to develop and execute go-to-market strategies for new product launches, including pricing, positioning, and promotional activities. Ensure the Revenue and Business requirement is inline with the Product enhancement. Efficient in developing Process notes, Presentations and Product map models.
column11: Product Life Cycle Management, Product Strategy, Product Conceptualization, Product Innovation, Product Roadmap, Product Launch, Product Planning

column2: Mission of this Position    : Build a product that meet customer needs with the least resources to save   costs.      Translate customer needs into initiatives while aligning stakeholders internally to influence the business strategy.       Key Accountabilities / Responsibilities:       - Facilitate requirements gathering. Co-ordinate Requirements ,Management interaction & Technical Documentation release to Customer   - Review and Agree on PD content of customer Target Agreement / Statement of Work   - Lead technical meetings with Customers and negotiate the delivery contents and dates   - Create / Track PD(Product Development) Project Level timing plan(s) and track with risk mitigation plans   - Lead PD Budget Tracking, PD Resource adjustments and PD Level Status Tracking & Reporting   - Lead and/or organize Cross-Discipline technical reviews, tasks prioritization, problem Solving and issue management   - Coordinating for product specifications and procedures to the manufacturing team for production purposes.   - Testing products throughout the design process to troubleshoot any potential problems.   - Analyzing existing products to identify areas for improvement and updating current documentation.   - Performing market research to understand market requirements for new product development.   - Fine-tuning designs until they are ready for production.   - Co-ordinate Test Requests for DV, EMC, CERT, Development Testing etc.   - Document Lessons learned from engineering team by phase and feed back to PD Team to update appropriate engineering documents. Ensure DFMEAs are updated with these lessons   -Adhere to Company corporate and local processes, methods, procedures.     -6+ yrs experience in Automotive development and Testing (Experience in EV Two Wheeler / 3 wheeler /4W is an advantage) with Bachelor or Master Degree in Mechanical / Electrical & Electronics / Mechatronics.   -Hands on experience on Electric Vehicle Powertrain components is mandatory and Knowledge on batteries, BMS, Motor, Motor Controllers would be added advantage   -Hands on experience on calibration, diagnostic, testing and commissioning of electrical/electronic control system and CAN communication protocol.       Person/Competency Specification     Personal Skills Attributes:     - Strong interpersonal skills to work with people at all levels and cross functional team.   - Excellent problem-solving skills, including ability to identify and resolve issues and challenges.   - A team player who is both flexible and creative in their approach to problem solving and high level of listening skill.       Key Functional Competencies:       - Electric Powertrain Controls and their features - Motor, Controller   -Vehicle Electrical Architecture, Awareness on BMS, Telematics.   -Functional Architecture, Electrical Architecture       Key Leadership Standards:       -Have a Passion for Winning: Never give up in the face of resistance and setbacks. Have fearless accountability for getting results   -Zealot for Growth: Promote confidence and trust. Aggressively focus on new opportunities and obsess with growth.   -Thinks Big Then Makes It Happen: Be willing to re-examine almost everything, Challenges the status Quo and Propose innovative solutions   and translate into actionable plans.       Tool Knowledge   :     - Hands on experience on Project Management Tools, CAN TOOLS

column2: Mission Statement  :    Responsible to conduct and manage type tests and design improvements related to Electrical aspects of product design,  across the G&PQSS range to ensure the product portfolio remains at the forefront of technology.  Including but not limited to performance improvements,  cost reductions,  increased manufacturability,  and new application/new market developments      Your Responsibilities:      Product proposal development: In conjunction with G&PQSS,  identify and develop proposals for new projects to meet changing product requirements and new development targets.       Product development: Responsible for leading R&D activities related to the G&PQS product line where innovation in design can lead to greater market share and/or new market opportunities.       Collaboration: Work closely with product line cross functional teams located across geographical regions.  This includes functions such as; SCM,  manufacturing/production,  service,  engineering,  sales,  project management,  product management.       Product market intelligence: Actively engage with global market and industry representatives to ensure market trends are noted and where applicable identify future development project opportunities.  Have thorough understanding of competitor offerings.       Project Delivery: Ensures alignment with assigned project development targets (time,  cost,  quality) and coordinates with the project team involved in specific R&D activities.       Problem Solving: Investigates and resolves reported problems on developed products.  Attend customer complaints on as needed basis.    New Ideas: Identifies new ideas and proposals for potential patenting in the specific technology field/domain.       Unit Costing and Supply Chain: Work closely with suppliers and SCM to achieve cost reductions on existing products,  as well as prioritising cost structures on new developements.  Ensure product complies with HE Parts Classification guidelines.       Knowledge Transfer: Ensure that best practice developments are shared between the relevant PQC units.  Communicate effectively with PL stakeholders and assist in the building of a network of competent resources within the HE organization.       Your Background:      Master degree in electrical power system engineering.     Hands-on experience in the field of R&D new product prototype development and type testing.     Preparation and review electrical design schematics,  product manual,  hardware specification,  software specification and power system calculation    Selection and finalization of electrical-electronics hardware based on calculation and analysis to fulfill product requirements.     Familiarity with industrial communication protocol enabled products.  Having ability of selection,  assembly,  and testing (Hardware and software both) Knowledge of product safety and cyber security    Knowledge in energy management system development.     Detailed knowledge of battery management system    Knowledge of relevant standards such as IEC,  UL    Basic Knowledge of software skill like Codesys, python software language ,  machine learning    Fluent English (written and spoken)    Cultural awareness,  social,  networking,  and good communication skills Strategic thinking,  stress-tolerant,  willing to travel.

column2: Purpose of the Role: Leading development of new product opportunities, defining product performance requirements, developing new test methods and product validation as per standard for product category. Lead Technology upgradation and product launch strategy. Role & responsibilities:   Strategy & Planning   '- Responsibility for the whole product design   & development process of category of products, starting from product   concept, preparing prototype sample, laboratory testing and final approval to   invest in the developed product       - Defining Product performance requirements, developing new test methods   and Product validation as per standard.   - Technology upgradation and Product   launch strategy.      - Creating an eco-system for technology introduction, product life cycle   and end of life transition.    Product/ Project Management   - Defining the problem, establishing the work   scope, preparing the budget and schedule, planning the work, providing   technical direction, and reporting the work status.      - Assess the requirements for new products based on the market needs in   cooperation with Product Management dept.       - Improving our product range and keeping the product range up to date with   the new trends in technology.      - Active market sensing & support to develop profitable models for   sustainable business.       - Profit Improvement thru model mix & model development based on market   needs & seasonality.      - Drive an agile product development process.      - Drive Key quality Indicators across all product categories to ensure that   all projects are delivered on cost and time to the highest quality standards.   Stakeholder Management -  Coordinate with Sourcing, Quality, Product   Management departments to update the Product range with the developed   product.   Policies, Processes & Procedures  - Perform complete review, verification and   validation for new products to ensure conformity to requirement and fitness   for use.      - Assist in updating the company catalogues and brochures.      - Submit periodical reports to Head showing the status of product category   progress.      - Oversee all activities of laboratory testing, maintain coordination   between product design, testing and validation activities. Keeping laboratory   & application design facilities to the up to date technology.      - Oversee the Design and Engineering planning activities, design review,   verification and validation for the new products, to ensure conformity to   specifications and fitness for use.      - Oversee the evaluation of new components in accordance with design   specification in coordination with purchase and quality assurance   departments.      - Establish product design reviews with the aim of reducing cost and   possibility of product standardization.      - New model development based on IIP, Value innovation for profit   improvement and Field failure rate (FFR) improvement.      - Work closely with technology teams, stakeholders and research centers on   new product plans, resource planning, budget allocation/control and periodic   report-out.

column2: Role & responsibilities     1.  Team Leadership :  Lead, mentor, and develop a team of electronics engineers and Staff, fostering a culture of collaboration, innovation, and continuous improvement.  Provide guidance, support, and coaching to team members to help them achieve their full potential and deliver high-quality work, Stay abreast of emerging technologies, industry trends, and best practices in electronic engineering.  Identify opportunities for innovation and improvement in electronic product design, manufacturing processes, and testing methodologies. 2.  Project Management :  Oversee the planning, execution, and delivery of electronic engineering projects, ensuring that they are completed on time, within budget, and to the highest quality standards. Coordinate with cross-functional teams including R&D, product management, and manufacturing to align project goals and priorities. Stay abreast of emerging technologies, industry trends, and best practices in electronic engineering. Identify opportunities for innovation and improvement in electronic product design, manufacturing processes, and testing methodologies. 3.  Electronic Design :  Provide technical leadership and guidance in the design and development of electronic systems, circuits, and components.  Collaborate with engineers to define specifications, develop schematics, and oversee PCB layout and fabrication. 4.  Testing and Validation :  Establish and implement testing and validation procedures to ensure the reliability, performance, and safety of electronic products.  Conduct thorough testing and analysis of electronic systems and components, and oversee compliance with industry standards and regulations. 5.  Quality Assurance :  Implement and maintain rigorous quality assurance processes to ensure that electronic products meet the highest standards of quality and reliability.  Work closely with quality assurance teams to address any issues or defects and drive continuous improvement initiatives, collaborate closely with internal stakeholders including senior management, engineering teams, sales, and marketing to align electronic engineering efforts with overall business objectives.  Communicate project updates, milestones, and challenges effectively to stakeholders. Preferred candidate profile   12 to 15 years of experience in electronic engineering, with at least 3-5 years in a leadership or managerial role.  Perks and benefits As per company policy
column11: Innovation, Project Management, Quality assurance, Testing and validation, electronic design

column2: As Manager Robot Control Systems, you will be responsible for leading the development of various controls architecture and algorithms, leading with a team of talented engineers       You will work on multiple robotic systems and be involved in solving challenging problems for cutting-edge robotics technology and applications     Also, you will work closely with a cross-disciplinary team of hardware and software engineers to efficiently implement ongoing research and ideas into our robot technology platform     You will see your ideas translated into actions that matter in the real world to make robots that are intelligent, collaborative, and intuitive to work with     The ideal candidate will have a strong background with demonstrated experience in modeling and designing feedback control algorithms and methods for complex and non-linear electromechanical systems        Job Responsibilities       Define technical direction and coherent strategy for control systems for different robotic platforms.         Develop feedback control algorithms and sensor fusion methods for complex and non-linear electromechanical systems.         Coordinate in development of a robust system level design for software and hardware.         Collaborate with engineers from other disciplines and communicate design priorities and provide constructive guidance to evolve a robust and reliable robot platform.         Lead and mentor team to effectively contribute to product milestones.       Required Skills and Experience       8+ years of professional experience in development of controls systems for complex electromechanical systems.         Solid foundation in control theory and application ie, stability analysis, continuous discrete-time systems, frequency time domain analysis, state-space analysis etc         Knowledge of control techniques and algorithms for BLDC motors.         Experience in MATLAB/SIMULINK or similar kind of tools.         Experience in instrumentation for testing, data acquisition and analysis.         Knowledge of real-time constraints and hardware interfaces (eg Ethernet, CAN, UART, SPI, I2C etc) is a plus.         The ideal candidate would have strong leadership and communication skills and would be able to collaborate with an interdisciplinary team.         A good understanding of the software development process and best practices is a plus.         Ability and desire to work in a fast-paced, iterative development environment.         Willingness to take on new challenges and solve unfamiliar problems.       Education       MTech/ PhD in the field(s) of Electrical Engineering or related field with specialization in controls
column11: Electrical engineering, electromechanical, Ethernet, Instrumentation, Hardware, Simulink, MATLAB, SPI, Robotics

Key responsibilities for the position:       Take lead in identifying RMS technologies, conducting market research on the relevant products etc         Engaging and building partnership with potential partners for establishing and running a RMS system for the 25K health program         Coordination with respective vendors on documentation for implementation of RMS solutio         Develop process documentation/ check list to ensure regular monitoring of the RMS solution         Develop a fully functional dashboard to integrate all RMS system parameters across all geographies         RMS installation quality check and data validation         Daily monitoring of the RMS dashboard and ensuring system functionality. column2: Job Title: Head of Product (Wealth Management) Location: Mumbai Position Overview: As the Head of Product for our Wealth Management division, you will be a key leader in driving the development, implementation, and management of our wealth management product offerings. You will be responsible for developing strategies that maximize the commercial potential of our product set, ensuring alignment with short, medium, and long-term goals. Your role will encompass creating investment solutions, designing financial planning models, curating portfolios for high-net-worth individuals (HNI), and ideating on new product opportunities, including structured products. Key Responsibilities: Strategy Development and Execution: Lead the creation and execution of strategic plans to maximize the commercial potential of wealth management products. Develop clear and compelling roadmaps and priorities for each product set within the Wealth Management portfolio. Conduct detailed business case analyses for new products and product extensions, supporting proposed strategies with robust data and market insights. 2.Product Development and Management: Create and curate investment solutions tailored to HNI clients based on their risk profiles, goals, and well-defined needs. Design financial planning models and structured products in collaboration with the institutional team. Continuously enhance the product basket by identifying new opportunities and designing innovative products. 3.Relationship Management: Build and maintain strong relationships with business partners, Asset Management Companies (AMCs), third-party product providers, and negotiate commercials and new tie-ups. Serve as a primary contact point for internal and external stakeholders, ensuring effective communication and alignment with business goals. 4.Team Leadership and Collaboration: Lead and mentor a team of Product Managers, fostering a culture of collaboration and high performance. Work closely with cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and operations, to ensure cohesive execution of product strategies. Required Qualifications: Experience: A minimum of 10 years of experience in product management within the Wealth Management industry. Proven track record of developing and managing wealth management products, including mutual funds (MF), portfolio management services (PMS), alternative investment funds (AIF), equity, fixed income, and structured products. Education: A masters degree in finance or business administration is highly desirable. Skills: In-depth knowledge of wealth products and wealth management software/platforms. Excellent communication skills, with the ability to effectively communicate at all levels of the organization and externally. Strong analytical skills and the ability to support strategies with detailed business case analyses. Personal Attributes: Strategic thinker with a strong business acumen. Ability to lead and inspire a team. High level of integrity and professionalism. Excellent relationship-building skills. Proactive and innovative mindset.
column11: Wealth Management, Product Management, Portfolio Management, Aif
